item.description:
The 2nd Annual Victoria L. Mosier Memorial 5Mile Race/Family Fun Day Event
Sunday, November 07, 2010
10:00 AM
Raynham, MA

*I marked the event time at 9am to include registration, picking up bib #'s and getting ready to run/walk. Prior to the event we can figure out meeting up, or a carpool from the Braintree area to Raynham if we have interest.

Pre-race registration is $18.00 and day of race registration is $20.00. T-Shirts for the first 200 pre-registered runners. There will be food and beverages sponsored by Texas Roadhouse, and entertainment on hand after the race.

RACE LOCATION:
American Legion Hall
291 Mill Street
Raynham, MA 02767

RACE DESCRIPTION:
Start/Finish at the American Legion Hall on Mill St., Raynham, MA. A flat and fast 5 mile residential course. Water at 3.1 and at finish. Splits every mile.

EVENT(s):
5 Mile Run [10:00 am]

RACE LOCATION:
American Legion Hall
291 Mill Street
Raynham, MA 02767

RACE DESCRIPTION:
Start/Finish at the American Legion Hall on Mill St., Raynham, MA. A flat and fast 5 mile residential course. Water at 3.1 and at finish. Splits every mile.

PRIZES:
Cash to the top three male & female finishers ($100, $75, $50). Awards to the top three in each age division: 18 & under, 19-29, 30-39, 40-49, 50-59, 60-69, 70 & over.

Online registration available through 11/4/10 for $18 @:
http://www.needtorace...

Proceeds from the Victoria L. Mosier Memorial Run will benefit Homes for Our Troops.

Homes for Our Troops is a non-profit, non-partisan 501(c)(3) organization building specially adapted homes for Servicemen and Women who have returned from combat in Iraq or Afghanistan with serious disabilities and injuries. We assist these disabled veterans across the country by raising donations of money, building materials and professional labor and coordinating the process of building a new home at no cost to the veteran

Homes for Our Troops
6 Main St.
Taunton, MA 02780
http://www.homesforou... for Our Troops

group.name: The South Shore Fitness Meetup Group

item.name: Victoria L Mosier "Home for Our Troops" 5 MILE Walk/Run
